key_70.name: Grateful Dead
key_70.set1: Sugar Magnolia-> Sugaree, Walkin' Blues, Althea, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Candyman, Cassidy, Touch Of Grey
key_70.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Samson & Delilah, Ship of Fools, Iko Iko*-> Mona*-> Jam*-> Drums-> Jam-> The Wheel-> I Need A Miracle-> Wharf Rat-> Good Lovin', E: Knockin' On Heaven's Door
key_70.comment: *w/ Carlos Santana & Gary Duncan Quicksilver, guitars; Last "Mona": 03-25-72; Final GD Perfomance of "Mona"

key_71.name: Grateful Dead
key_71.set1: Bertha, Greatest Story Ever Told, El Paso, Wang Dang Doodle, Loose Lucy, Memphis Blues, Bird Song
key_71.set2: Saint Of Circumstance, Crazy Fingers-> Playin' In The Band-> Jam*-> Drums-> Jam-> All Along The Watchtower-> Stella Blue-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: The Weight

key_72.name: Grateful Dead
key_72.set1: Picasso Moon, Friend Of The Devil, Me & My Uncle-> Maggie's Farm, Brown Eyed Women, It's All Over Now, Tennessee Jed, The Music Never Stopped
key_72.set2: Eyes Of The World-> Estimated Prophet-> Terrapin Station-> Drums-> Jam-> The Other One-> Black Peter-> Around & Around, E: The Mighty Quinn

key_73.name: Grateful Dead
key_73.set1: Help On The Way-> Slipknot!-> Franklin's Tower, Little Red Rooster, Loser, Just Like Tom Thumb's Blues, Let It Grow
key_73.set2: Scarlet Begonias-> Fire On The Mountain, Truckin'-> Spoonful*, Dark Star*, Drums-> Jam**-> Dark Star*-> The Last Time*, Standing On the Moon-> Throwing Stones-> Not Fade Away, E: Werewolves of London*
key_73.comment: * with Gary Duncan, guitar. ** w/ Ken Kesey rap. Final / last Werewolves.

key_74.name: Grateful Dead
key_74.set1: Hell In A Bucket, China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Wang Dang Doodle**, Born On The Bayou*, Green River*, Bad Moon Rising*, Proud Mary*, Truckin'-> The Other One-> Wharf Rat-> Sunshine Daydream, E: Forever Young***, Touch of Grey
key_74.comment: "Laughter, Love and Music" memorial for Bill Graham; without Bruce Hornsby; * John Fogerty, guitar and vocals; **John Popper Blues Traveler, harmonica; *** Neil Young, guitar and vocal

key_75.name: Grateful Dead
key_75.set1: Cold Rain & Snow, Little Red Rooster, They Love Each Other, Mama Tried-> Mexicali Blues, Loose Lucy, Memphis Blues, Stagger Lee, The Music Never Stopped
key_75.set2: Scarlet Begonias-> Fire On The Mountain-> Looks Like Rain-> Terrapin Station-> Drums-> Jam-> The Wheel-> All Along The Watchtower-> Black Peter-> Around & Around, E: It's All Over Now Baby Blue

key_76.name: Grateful Dead
key_76.set1: One More Saturday Night-> Jack Straw, El Paso, Minglewood Blues, Dire Wolf, Queen Jane Approximately, Loser, Cassidy-> Deal
key_76.set2: Foolish Heart-> Women Are Smarter-> Uncle John's Band-> Playin' In The Band-> The Same Thing-> Jam-> Drums-> Jam-> I Need A Miracle-> Standing On the Moon-> Throwing Stones-> One More Saturday Night, E: U.S. Blues

key_77.name: Grateful Dead
key_77.set1: Touch Of Gray, Victim Or The Crime, Row Jimmy, Big River-> Maggie's Farm, Ramble On Rose, Just Like Tom Thumb's Blues, Bird Song-> Promised Land
key_77.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, Samson & Delilah, Ship of Fools, Saint Of Circumstance-> Jam*-> Drums-> Jam-> The Last Time-> Stella Blue-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: The Weight

key_78.name: Grateful Dead
key_78.set1: Hell In A Bucket, Candyman, Beat It On Down The Line, It Must Have Been The Roses, Black Throated Wind, West L.A. Fadeaway, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Help On The Way-> Slipknot!-> Franklin's Tower
key_78.set2: Not Fade Away*-> Eyes Of The World-> Estimated Prophet-> Drums-> Jam-> The Other One-> Wharf Rat-> Sugar Magnolia, E: Knockin' On Heaven's Door
key_78.comment: *w/Airto Moreira rebirth Jazz Band and Bela' & the Flecktones Opened

key_79.name: Grateful Dead
key_79.set1:
Credits Screen: Wonderful World Party Hardy
Jerry Garcia Bar Video: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes
Jerry Garcia Band 11-24-91 Target Center Minneapolis, Minnesota Jerry Garcia, John Kahn, David Kemper, David Nelson, Sandy Rothman
How Sweet It Is To Be Loved By You And It Stoned Me Lay Down Sally My Sisters And Brothers Don-Ft Let That Deal Go Down -A
(Last 4 minutes of) Don-Ft Let That Deal Go Down -A
key_79.set2:
In Concert '91 ABC Television July 5, 1991 program featured the Grateful Dead:
Grateful Dead: Saint of Circumstance, June 17, 1991 Lyle Lovett: Friend of the Devil Jerry Garcia cameo about recycling cans Suzanne Vega: China Doll & Interview (Excerpt) Dwight Yokum: Truckin-F & Interview (Excerpt) -A Grateful Dead: Eyes of the World, June 17, 1991
(continued) Grateful Dead: Eyes of the World, June 17, 1991 Rain Forest Discussion Jerry, Bobby & Dr. Jason Gray Indigo Girls: Uncle John-Fs Band -A Grateful Dead: I Need a Miracle, June 16, 1991
??Late Night with David Letterman Show?? (10 minutes) (It appears that this program followed the Concert -F91 program, -A and that the recorder was left running.)

key_80.name: Grateful Dead
key_80.set1:
"Lifelines" KTVU TV
Interview with Jerry. Few live performance clips
